thread.title: Sela Tunnel: Top 10 facts as PM Modi inaugurates world's longest bi-lane underpass in Arunachal
thread.title_full: Sela Tunnel: Top 10 facts as PM Modi inaugurates world's longest bi-lane underpass in Arunachal - The Economic Times Video | ET Tv

title: Sela Tunnel: Top 10 facts as PM Modi inaugurates world's longest bi-lane underpass in Arunachal
text:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the Sela Tunnel, a groundbreaking project to enhance military connectivity in Arunachal Pradesh. The tunnel, considered the world's longest bi-lane tunnel, will provide all-weather connectivity to Tawang, a town bordering China. Its strategic benefits include troop deployment and socio-economic advancement. Despite delays due to Covid-19, the Border Roads Organisation completed this engineering marvel, which enhances defense readiness and contributes to regional development. Watch!", "image": { "@type": "ImageObject", "url": "https://img.etimg.com/thumb/msid-108353844,width- Sela Tunnel: Top 10 facts as PM Modi inaugurates world's longest bi-lane underpass in Arunachal Sela Tunnel: Top 10 facts as PM Modi inaugurates world's longest bi-lane underpass in Arunachal ET Online | 09 Mar 2024, 07:50 PM IST Post a Comment Copy URL Embed Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the Sela Tunnel, a groundbreaking project to enhance military connectivity in Arunachal Pradesh. The tunnel, considered the world's longest bi-lane tunnel, will provide all-weather connectivity to Tawang, a town bordering China. Its strategic benefits include troop deployment and socio-economic advancement. Despite delays due to Covid-19, the Border Roads Organisation completed this engineering marvel, which enhances defense readiness and contributes to regional development. Watch!
